CustomField.formula: '$' & IF( Estimated_Annual_Revenue_Min__c >= 1000, RIGHT( TEXT( FLOOR( ROUND(Estimated_Annual_Revenue_Min__c, 0 ) / 1000 ) ), 3 ) & ',', '') & RIGHT( TEXT( FLOOR(Estimated_Annual_Revenue_Min__c)), 3) & ' - $' & IF( Estimated_Annual_Revenue_Max__c >= 1000, RIGHT( TEXT( FLOOR( ROUND( Estimated_Annual_Revenue_Max__c, 0 ) / 1000 ) ), 3 ) & ',', '') & RIGHT( TEXT( FLOOR(Estimated_Annual_Revenue_Max__c ) ), 3 )
CustomField.label: Estimated Annual Revenue
